Thoughts on the Needle When I started using meth six years or so ago, I smoked it.
That was how I was introduced to it.
I liked it a lot, but whenever I use uppers I binge on them until I'm doing things I never thought I would do for just one more good hit.
I was doing heroin for months at a time back then, and meth was just there for fun on the side.
I hardly ever even paid for it and didn't seek it out unless I was already high and trying to put off the inevitable comedown.
Eventually I tried IVing heroin.
Because I'm super duper smart guy, I didn't think the needle had much of a hold on me.
I only did small shots, and while I might shoot for a few days or weeks at a time, I always ended up going back to smoking H off of foil.
I guess it's kind of the same with meth, but goddamn, when I shoot this stuff it's such a better high than smoking it or snorting it.
Boofing is pretty much the same, but it doesn't have the much appeal to me since I started to appreciate the blood gushing into the syringe.
The immediate gratification of an easy register, or even the hard-won elation at hitting a vein after a long and bloody search for one, is just something else.
The rush is good, yeah, but I'm a stingy bastard when it comes to my drugs, and I'm not the type to shoot half of my whole stash in one go.
I'm trying to avoid reality for as long as I can after all, so the rush is nice and everything but not really what I'm looking for.
The point of this was just to say that shooting is wicked.
Wicked in the New England sense and wicked in the literal sense.
At this moment I don't think I ever want to do this drug any other way.
It's the needle or fuck off, I don't want to get stuck hitting a pipe.
Doing lines is so 19 year old cokehead me.
The needle is where it's at.
And that's really not a good thing.
This is a nice corner.
Or should I go do one on the dirty ass toilet?

Any tips for tapering off heroin?

I haven't been shooting, only snorting and very occasionally smoking it.

ANY advice on tapering would be a miracle.
methadone potentiation hello people of r/opiates!
does anybody know whether methadone is active itself, or has to be converted into a more active metabolite like the conversion of codeine into morphine?
I'd like to potentiate my methadone doses.
So would cimetidine, a liver enzyme inhibitor, do that?
if not, or if methadone does have to be converted metabolically, does anybody know of any potentiators that either enhance or don't rely on enzymatic effects?
also any other potentiators you know of much appreciated!
the ones I know about are cimetidine, DXM/other dissos, curcumin, and benzos.
Though I've also heard that magnesium and vitamins B and D can help lower tolerance if taken regularly, does anybody know if this is true?
thank you!
​  also, a non-opiate related question, does anybody know if etizolam shows up on a drug test, and if so for how long?
and if it does, do you know of any other RC benzos that don't show up?
sorry for all the questions guis, and thank you!

Is it the m*th, or is it just me?
I've smoked with friends a few times (their bong, and they light it up and tell me when to inhale since I'm new - I've tried asking if I could try doing it myself but they were pretty insistent).
The whole euphoric high kicks in when I inhale, and there's also the sweats and the whole not sleeping/ not being sleepy, not feeling hungry and etc.

Recently I got my own stuff (bong, low flame lighter, and I bought stuff) and I figured I'd smoke by myself, but there's something wrong, like I don't feel the same and there's nothing from the second paragraph).
At first I thought it's the m*th itself, but I've bought from two other people but it's still roughly the same.
Kinda sucks tbh, and I was wondering if anyone had any thoughts on why this is happening.
I can't go back to my earlier friends to ask, so I'm pretty lost since I don't know anyone else.
Would really appreciate it if anyone could help me out or give me a few pointers.
